words.source: H559 ('amar, waw-consecutive Qal wayyiqtol 3ms) 'to say'; KJV/ESV/NASB 'said'
H5493 (sur, Qal cohortative 1cs) 'to turn aside/depart'; cohortative expressing resolve; KJV 'I will now turn aside', ESV 'I will turn aside', NASB 'I must turn aside'
H4994 (na', particle of entreaty) 'now/please'; KJV 'now', ESV omits, NASB omits
H7200 (ra'ah, waw + Qal cohortative 1cs) 'to see'; KJV 'and see', ESV 'to see', NASB 'and see'
H853 ('et, direct object marker); untranslated in English
H4758 (mar'eh, noun common ms absolute with definite article) 'sight/appearance/vision'; KJV 'this great sight', ESV 'this great sight', NASB 'this marvelous sight'
H1419 (gadol, adjective ms absolute with definite article) 'great'; KJV 'great', ESV 'great', NASB 'marvelous'
H2088 (zeh, demonstrative pronoun ms with definite article) 'this'; KJV/ESV/NASB 'this'
H4069 (maddua', interrogative adverb) 'why'; KJV 'why', ESV 'why', NASB 'why'
H1197 (ba'ar, Qal imperfect 3ms) 'to burn/consume'; KJV 'is not burnt', ESV 'is not burned up', NASB 'is not burned up'
H5572 (seneh, noun common ms absolute with definite article) 'the bush'; KJV/ESV/NASB 'the bush'
